<h3 id="X11246">X(11246)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTROID OF THE MANDART EXCIRCLES TRIANGLE; see X(10974)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2 a^3-a b^2-b^3+2 a b c+b^2 c-a c^2+b c^2-c^3: :
